comments.body: @robmcmullen -- Are you ok being added as a co-maintainer of the `jsonpickle` package on conda-forge?

comments.body: Can you please add `license_file: COPYING` and `dev_url: https://github.com/jsonpickle/jsonpickle`

about:
  summary: Python library for serializing any arbitrary object graph into JSON. It can take almost any Python object and turn the object into JSON. Additionally, it can reconstitute the object back into Python.
